Site Monitoring - TheHive API Functions¶

Watcher.site_monitoring.thehive.create_observables(hive_api, case_id, site)¶

Create IOCs observables.

Parameters

  • hive_api – TheHive API Object.

  • case_id – TheHive Case ID.

  • site – Site Object.

Returns

Watcher.site_monitoring.thehive.search_observables(hive_api, case_id, keyword)¶

Search observables containing the keyword provided.

Parameters

  • hive_api – TheHive API Object.

  • case_id – TheHive Case ID.

  • keyword – Observable requested.

Returns

True if there is observables.

Return type

bool

Watcher.site_monitoring.thehive.update_observables(hive_api, site)¶

Update IOCs observables.

Parameters

  • hive_api – TheHive API Object.

  • site – Site Object.

Returns
